text: Ne nimuli khuluchendo nimulanyoola omuhandichi tawe, biyela okhuhana eshisingwa. Ne mulala wenyu nabishila owashie kho ulia usubilwe akalusie eshia owashie yamuhelesia. Ne arie Nyasaye omulesi wuwe, Ne mulafisa obuloli tawe, ne ulia ulafisa omwoyo kwaye kulaba kukholele amabii. Ne Nyasaye ni Omumanyi Owamachesi muno khukamukholanga
